name: Happy Earth 100% Natuurlijke Douchegel Lavender
composition: INGREDIENTS: Aqua, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Parfum*, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Glyceryl Oleate, Lavandula Hybrida Grosso Herb Oil*, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia Peel Oil*, Cananga Odorata Flower Extract*, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Levulinic Acid, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Linalool*, Limonene*, Citronellol*, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid. *From natural botanical extracts and essential oils.
